nodes.text: A diplomatic ploov was a piece of headgear worn by Neimoidians. Lufa Danak wore one during the Invasion of Naboo. Senator Lott Dod also wore a miter with a ploov.
Diplomatic ploovs first appeared in Star Wars: Episode I The Phantom Menace, and were identified in the 2012 reference book Star Wars: The Phantom Menace: The Expanded Visual Dictionary.
